betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe chaos dragon is beatable in chapter 2, and astral sorcery has some tools that can be used to do that.

Chaos protection is a great armor trait, and it can only be obtained with astral, and so is the way of imprisoning mobs...

§fThere are a lot of weapons that deal a lot of damage, and chaos protection is indeed available...
If only there were powerful spells and enchantments to help me...
